text: The 400 metres, or 400-meter dash, is a sprint event in track and field competitions. It has been seen in the athletics programme at the Summer Olympics since 1896 for men and since 1964 for women. It happens on a standard outdoor running track and the race is one lap around the track. ==Continental records== *Updated 9 August 2024.
